content: Should extern types not implement Freeze? We can't really know what's in them. Right now they might implement Freeze, i'm not quite sure how auto traits work with extern types: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/45088b11f55e57a65fa1ebcf6e3b6014152eb516/src/libcore/marker.rs#L598
in fact I believe it reappeared sometime after 1.8 or so. #{no_core] crates didnâ€™t need to define the Freeze lang-trait after 1.0 untli some time later.
extern type doesn't implement any auto trait, and thus not Freeze (nor Send nor Sync)
Freeze is used to implement some of the checks for statics iirc
but it's not used exposed right now

extern type doesn't implement any auto trait, and thus not Freeze (nor Send nor Sync)

that's great
